BBEX3.A.MWK.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Malawi  / EUR 1 = MWK ... (buying)
Source: Reserve Bank of Malawi, Lilongwe
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 2012: On 7 May 2012, the Malawi kwacha was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate):  4 May 2012: EUR 1 = MWK 216.4162 / 220.7882  7 May 2012: EUR 1 = MWK 322.0718 / 328.5783 Calculated devaluation: 32.8%.
